# Purvi Sankhla - Climate Finance, Data Strategy & Netherlands Business Expert

## About
Purvi Sankhla is a climate finance expert, data strategist, and Chartered Accountant specializing in:
- Climate finance and impact investing
- ESG data strategy and reporting
- Starting a business in the Netherlands
- Dutch tax optimization and VAT administration
- Sustainable business models and circular economy

## Credentials
- Chartered Accountant (ICAI, India)
- MSc Strategic Management (Sustainability Focus), Tilburg University
- Food100NL "50 Under 35" Awardee 2024
- AI Challenge Winner, Provincie Noord-Brabant NL

## Key Resources
- Business Starter Kit 2026: Complete guide to starting a business in the Netherlands
- Netherlands Tax Benefits Calculator: Interactive tool for calculating VAT credits and tax benefits
- 30-Day Action Plan: Step-by-step business launch roadmap
- Climate finance and ESG strategy articles

## Services
- Climate finance & impact investment advisory
- ESG data pipeline automation
- Netherlands business setup and tax compliance
- Circular business model design
- Financial modeling and KPI dashboards
